forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 81. South southeast wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms between 7pm and midnight, then showers and thunderstorms between midnight and 3am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 3am and 4am. Some of the storms could be severe. Mostly cloudy. Low around 64, with temperatures rising to around 66 overnight. South wind 6 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 86, with temperatures falling to around 84 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms after 8pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 60. South wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
